Description:
Architecturally Designed, Enviable Location!
Prominently perched at the bowl of a picturesque court within sought-after Croydon North, this sophisticated home; oozing great taste and classic architectural design will appeal to those who demand pleasing aesthetics, practicality and lifestyle blending. The home makes good use of the northerly aspect with a boomerang-shaped concept, a superb orientation used to its maximum effect and soaks up the surrounding view.

The formal lounge is a resplendent room in which to entertain or relax, capturing the light through abundant glazing's. Furthermore, there is a separate rumpus room situated away from the formal lounge, an ideal space for billiards, games room or informal entertainment.

The upper level contains a family retreat and study nook as well as housing five generous-sized robed bedrooms with the well proportioned master boasting a walk-in robe, full en-suite and finished with a beautiful bay window; a feature echoed throughout. There are two bathrooms, designed to handle a larger family, both featuring timber vanities and shower with the main bathroom comprising a bath.
The large grassy backyard can also be accessed via a second driveway and is safe for children and pets to play while parents can relax in the tiered barbeque area, perfect for casual entertaining.
Other inclusions list as; gas ducted heating and vacuum, evaporative cooling, air-conditioning (lounge), solar power, slate flooring, security alarm, intercom, large laundry with bench space, storage throughout and under house, remote double garage with internal access and pedestrian access to rear and double gates to the backyard.

This stately home is an exemplary example of fine family living.

Family Oasis on 1/4 Acre Block
This wonderful brick veneer home has impressive street appeal that will reveal to you upon entry an absolute family oasis for everyone to enjoy.
Privately located in the highly sought after Croydon North area on a block of over a 1/4 acre in size (1038m2 approximately) the home offers you 4 good sized bedrooms, the main is situated at the back of the home and has large built in robes, full ensuite with double sized shower.

Before moving outside we mustn't forget other internal features such as gas ducted heating, open fire, evaporative cooling, main bathroom with separate toilet, high ceilings, attic ladder to internal roof storage, soft subtle colours and tones plus a family friendly floor plan.

Soak up the views over the backyard and beyond whilst taking in the sights and sounds of native bird life in the well established trees and gardens.
The yard is a kids paradise, with ample room for backyard cricket or footy, basketball court area and of course the fully fenced pool that is easily visible from the balcony ensuring Mum and Dad keep a close eye on all the action.
Parking off road is made easy in the extra large double carport and room if needed for the caravan, boat or trailer.
So much you'll enjoy and appreciate in this family oasis, so be quick and book your viewing today.
